title: Raius: Master Swordsman Reborn
alternative_title: 生まれ変わった剣聖、剣士が冷遇される魔術至上主義の学園で無双する ; A Reincarnated Sword Saint in a Magic-Obsessed Academy ; Umarekawatta Kensei, Kenshi ga Reiguu sareru Majutsu Shijou Shugi no Gakuen de Musou suru; Raius: Master Swordsman Reborn
status: 生まれ変わった剣聖、剣士が冷遇される魔術至上主義の学園で無双する ; A Reincarnated Sword Saint in a Magic-Obsessed Academy ; Umarekawatta Kensei, Kenshi ga Reiguu sareru Majutsu Shijou Shugi no Gakuen de Musou suru; Raius: Master Swordsman Reborn
description:
Description :
        A man who became acclaimed in his time as the one legendary "Sword Master" has been reborn in a new era with his memories intact. Now armed with the goal of reaching even greater heights with his abilities, Raius has set his eyes on a place in the royal academy. However, in this new world sorcery reigns supreme over all forms of combat. Those seeking to learn the way of the sword are treated with total disrespect. It is no matter though for our reincarnated Sword Master. With but a single blade, Raius is determined to break through all the sorcerers that stand his way and change the world.
